The cycle of life and death continues. We will live, they will die.

About Nasus

Nasus - the wise

Nasus is always on the lookout for knowledge, Nasus' handle on military strategy and logistics ensured that he became the youngest general in Shuriman history. While he was a competent soldier, his genius lay not in fighting battles, but in planning them.
